entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort St. John
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:12 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -26.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 08:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -26.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -39
Dewpoint: -29.8°C
Wind: SE 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
